metadata.title: CVE-2024-57935 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix accessing invalid dip_ctx during destroying QPIf it fails to modify QP to RTR, dip_ctx will not be attached. Andduring detroying QP, the invalid dip_ctx pointer will be accessed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-57935` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-gcp - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required
